remarks: If the numerator converges to 0 and the denominator converges to non zero then the fraction converges to 0.  (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 11-Dec-2019.)
statement:
0ellimcdiv.f $e |- F = ( x e. A |-> B ) $.
0ellimcdiv.g $e |- G = ( x e. A |-> C ) $.
0ellimcdiv.h $e |- H = ( x e. A |-> ( B / C ) ) $.
0ellimcdiv.b $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> B e. CC ) $.
0ellimcdiv.c $e |- ( ( ph /\ x e. A ) -> C e. ( CC \ { 0 } ) ) $.
0ellimcdiv.0limf $e |- ( ph -> 0 e. ( F limCC E ) ) $.
0ellimcdiv.d $e |- ( ph -> D e. ( G limCC E ) ) $.
0ellimcdiv.dne0 $e |- ( ph -> D =/= 0 ) $.
0ellimcdiv $p |- ( ph -> 0 e. ( H limCC E ) ) $.
$d A x $.
$d ph x $.
